# p0 Provider

Configures a P0 organization. Requires a P0 account. Go to https://p0.app to create an account.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "p0" {
  org = "my-org"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org` (String) Your P0 organization identifier.
